subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Doping (Sports)
Tests (Drug Use)
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Froome, a British cyclist whose two Tour de France wins drew doping allegations, released tests arranged by his wife in an article in the British edition of Esquire magazine.
snippet: Froome, a British cyclist whose two Tour de France wins drew doping allegations, released tests arranged by his wife in an article in the British edition of Esquire magazine.
